content.rendered:
Quick video that’s all about how Bridge Career started and why.

If you need staffing for your company, just call 918-622-2588, and Bridge Careers can help you find the best, talented employees for the job. In the news, we have been featured on ABC, Fox, CBS, and NBC, as well as the New York Times, The Washington Post and the Tulsa Business Journal, so call us today, or visit our website to find out more https://trinityemployment.com

<iframe loading="lazy" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/YS9VQ15uiHI" width="560" height="315" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="allowfullscreen"></iframe>
